95% Off your first month or 20% off your first year!
All new clients who sign up and use the coupon code "February2009" during the checkout process will receive an automatic 95% off if ordering monthly or an automatic 20% off if ordering yearly on top of any other automatic discounts! Offer valid 02/01/09 to 02/28/09. Limit 1 promotion per order, not valid with any other offer. Promotion valid for new customers only.​

View more details or place your order at http://www.mddhosting.com/vps.php

Managed cPanel and DirectAdmin Virtual Private Servers are available, please see our web site for details.
